display_html: type Storage = StorageSkeleton StorageFields
name: Storage

display_html: type StorageC store = (LedgerC store, StorageContains store ["admin" := Address, "paused" := Bool])
name: StorageC

display_html: type LedgerC store = StorageContains store ["totalSupply" := Natural, "ledger" := (Address ~> LedgerValue)]
name: LedgerC

display_html: type LedgerValue = ("balance" :! Natural, "approvals" :! Map Address Natural)
name: LedgerValue

display_html: mkStorage :: Address -> Map Address Natural -> Storage
name: mkStorage

data Parameter
  • = Transfer TransferParams
  • | GetTotalSupply (View () Natural)
  • | GetBalance (View GetBalanceParams Natural)
name: Parameter Transfer GetTotalSupply GetBalance

name: TransferParams

display_html: type GetBalanceParams = "owner" :! Address
name: GetBalanceParams

data Parameter
  • = Transfer TransferParams
  • | GetTotalSupply (View () Natural)
  • | GetBalance (View GetBalanceParams Natural)

data Storage = Storage {
  • ledger :: BigMap Address Natural
  • totalSupply :: Natural
}
name: Storage Storage ledger totalSupply

data Parameter
  • = Transfer TransferParams
  • | Approve ApproveParams

  • | GetBalance (View GetBalanceParams Natural)
  • | GetTotalSupply (View () Natural)
name: Parameter Transfer GetTotalSupply GetBalance Approve GetAllowance

display_html: type ParameterC param = ParameterContainsEntryPoints param ["Transfer" :> TransferParams, "Approve" :> ApproveParams, "GetAllowance" :> View GetAllowanceParams Natural, "GetBalance" :> View GetBalanceParams Natural, "GetTotalSupply" :> View () Natural]
name: ParameterC

name: GetAllowanceParams

name: GetBalanceParams

data Parameter
  • = Transfer TransferParams
  • | Approve ApproveParams
  • | ApproveCAS ApproveCasParams
  • | GetAllowance (View GetAllowanceParams Natural)
  • | GetBalance (View GetBalanceParams Natural)
  • | GetTotalSupply (View () Natural)
  • | SetPause Bool
  • | SetAdministrator Address
  • | GetAdministrator (View () Address)
  • | Mint MintParams
  • | Burn BurnParams
name: Parameter Transfer GetTotalSupply GetBalance Approve GetAllowance ApproveCAS SetPause SetAdministrator GetAdministrator Mint Burn

name: TransferParams

name: ApproveParams

display_html: type GetAllowanceParams = ("owner" :! Address, "spender" :! Address)
name: GetAllowanceParams

display_html: type GetBalanceParams = "owner" :! Address
name: GetBalanceParams

display_html: type ApproveCasParams = ("spender" :! Address, "value" :! Natural, "expected" :! Natural)
name: ApproveCasParams

name: AllowanceParams

name: StorageC

name: managedLedgerContract

display_html: transfer :: forall store. (LedgerC store, StoreHasField store "paused" Bool) => Entrypoint TransferParams store
name: transfer

display_html: approve :: forall store. (LedgerC store, StoreHasField store "paused" Bool) => Entrypoint ApproveParams store
name: approve

display_html: approveCAS :: forall store. (LedgerC store, StoreHasField store "paused" Bool) => Entrypoint ApproveCasParams store
name: approveCAS

display_html: getAllowance :: LedgerC store => Entrypoint (View GetAllowanceParams Natural) store
name: getAllowance

display_html: getBalance :: LedgerC store => Entrypoint (View GetBalanceParams Natural) store
name: getBalance

display_html: getTotalSupply :: LedgerC store => Entrypoint (View () Natural) store
name: getTotalSupply

display_html: setPause :: StorageC store => Entrypoint Bool store
name: setPause

display_html: setAdministrator :: forall store. StorageC store => Entrypoint Address store
name: setAdministrator

display_html: getAdministrator :: StorageC store => Entrypoint (View () Address) store
name: getAdministrator

display_html: mint :: StorageC store => Entrypoint MintParams store
name: mint

display_html: burn :: StorageC store => Entrypoint BurnParams store
name: burn

name: creditTo

display_html: debitFrom :: forall param store. (param `HasFieldsOfType` ["from" := Address, "value" := Natural], LedgerC store) => '[param, store] :-> '[param, store]
name: debitFrom

display_html: authorizeAdmin :: StorageC store => (store ': s) :-> (store ': s)
name: authorizeAdmin

display_html: addTotalSupply :: StoreHasField store "totalSupply" Natural => (Integer ': (store ': s)) :-> (store ': s)
name: addTotalSupply

display_html: allowance :: (param `HasFieldsOfType` ["owner" := Address, "spender" := Address], LedgerC store) => (param ': (store ': s)) :-> (Natural ': s)
name: allowance

display_html: setAllowance :: forall store s. LedgerC store => (AllowanceParams ': (store ': s)) :-> (store ': s)
name: setAllowance

display_html: consumeAllowance :: forall store s. LedgerC store => (TransferParams ': (store ': s)) :-> (store ': s)
name: consumeAllowance

display_html: ensureNotPaused :: StoreHasField store "paused" Bool => (store ': s) :-> (store ': s)
name: ensureNotPaused
